gen:link.msg:message: res_v1074-1-1: T_20.05 [{if(exists($a)) then(xfi:fact-explicit-dimension-value($a, QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCF'))[1]) else(if(exists($b)) then(xfi:fact-explicit-dimension-value($b, QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCF'))[1]) else(if(exists($c)) then(xfi:fact-explicit-dimension-value($c, QName('http://www.eba.europa.eu/xbrl/crr/dict/dim','LCF'))[1]) else('NA')))}], if there is any cell reported in columns 0030 or 0040 or 0050, then columns 0020; 0030; 0040; 0050; 0070; 0080; 0090; 0100; 0110; 0120; 0130; 0140; 0150; 0160; 0170, 0180 must be reported. {16 - (count($d) + (if(exists($b)) then 1 else 0) + (if(exists($c)) then 1 else 0) + (if (exists($e)) then 1 else 0))} out of 16 fields are missing.
